wired.title: How Snow Can Cripple Boston's Subway Cars
wired.topComment: This could be very embarrassing to the author of this article. The Red Line train shown in the photo is made up with cars from the MBTA's 01800 series. These cars were delivered in the early 1990's and were the first MBTA cars to use AC PROPULSION.

wired.title: US Healthcare Is So Screwed I Fly to Britain for My Medication
wired.topComment: An interesting thing I see ignored in this article is the fact that the writer takes advantage of the NHS - since he lives and works in New York, he presumably does not support the NHS through payment of taxes or participating in commerce by living t...
